#summary What is Xdebug's support of DBGp like?

= Introduction =

Xdebug's support of DBGp is not complete. Some core commands and many extended commands are not supported. This page details Xdebug's DBGp support.

== Core Commands ==

=== stderr ===

This command is not supported at all. The implementation in the Xdebug source is just a hardcoded error response.
